speech: Rice Hispa chawal ke leaf-feeding pests ka ek issue hai jo zyadatar South Asia aur tropical areas mein hota hai.
Is pest ka scientific naam Dicladispa armigera hai. Ye pest leaves ko skeletonize karta hai aur photosynthesis ko disrupt karta hai.
Rice Hispa ke symptoms mein yellowing aur white streaks leaf ke surface par dekhi jati hain. Severe infestations ke case mein leaves brown aur dry ho jati hain.
Is problem ko manage karne ke liye timely pest scouting aur insecticides ka sahi istamal zaroori hai.
Natural predators jese ki parasitic wasps ka use bhi Rice Hispa ko control karne mein helpful hota hai.
Flooding aur water management practices ke zariye bhi pest infestations ko kam kiya ja sakta hai.
